기본정보.수업목표: All kinds of machines are combinational systems consisting of separable mechanical elements. Instead of machine design, mechanical element design is a major engineering course that deals with designing, developing, refining, and applying machines and mechanical systems. Basic mechanics and mathematical background knowledge are required for mechanical element design. We study the fundamentals of machine design and the applications of machine elements.
